Notes for Vancouver Canucks:

-Logan Couture scored his 30th goal of the season.

-Christian Dvorak notched his 20th assist of the season.
-Christopher Tanev ended his 8 game point drought.

Notes for Dallas Stars:
-Curtis McKenzie scored his 15th goal of the season.
-Pontus Aberg finally ended his 12 game point drought.
-Jamie Benn ended his 5 game goal drought.
